(as of Nov 30,2022 07:43:28 UTC – Details)


KT Tape is lightweight, comfortable to wear and can be used for many common injuries from neck and shoulder strains and pains all the way down to shin splints, Achilles tendonitis and nearly every injury that can affect muscles, joints and tendons in-between. KT Tape Classic is a cotton and elastic sports tape that relieves pain while supporting muscles, tendons and ligaments. When applied correctly, KT Tape reduces pressure to tissue which reduces discomfort and pain. That’s why KT Tape is used by and relied upon by professional athletes, athletic trainers and medical professionals. KT Tape is also used heavily in the Olympics by team USA. Sized at 2″ X 16′, This roll of KT Tape is designed to be cut into strips for customized care and a personalized fit. Making the classic Even more athlete friendly is that the acrylic based medical grade adhesive is gentle on skin, Unlike traditional athletic tape. This is one roll sized 2″ X 16′ Of Beige colored KT Tape Classic. In addition to pain relief, taping provides support to muscles by helping them to not over-extend or over-contract. KT Tape has more than 60 instructional videos available online teaching how to correctly apply the tape to support various body parts and to help with various injuries. The elastic core delivers strong support for muscles, joints and tendons without restricting comfort and range of motion. This means it will provide stronger support, for as long as you need it, remaining comfortable for up to 3 days. So durable, KT Tape will stay on in water be it the shower, The pool or the ocean. For best results, apply KT Tape One hour before activity and after you’ve first cleaned the skin of dirt and oils. Don’t overstretch the tape and make sure the ends are on skin, not on tape.
WHAT IS KT TAPE? – Elastic sports tape used by pro and serious athletes to support muscles, joints, tendons, and ligaments. It’s drug-free, latex-free, hypoallergenic, lightweight, breathable, comfortable, HSA/FSA approved, and easy to use.
HOW DOES IT WORK? – It helps reduce tissue pressure and support muscles and joints. Studies show it helps you recover faster from pain. Used for knee pain, shoulder pain, shin splints, back pain, plantar fasciitis, tennis elbow, and much more.
EASY TO USE – Easy to self-apply using our free application videos (see our site) for common injury areas.  Our Taping Basics video teaches you how to help the tape stick properly, and our 60+ videos help you apply it for your area of pain.
TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS – Relied on by professional and Olympic athletes, athletic trainers, and medical professionals to train longer and finish stronger. Used heavily by Team USA, NBA Trainers Association, US Soccer, USA Triathlon, and more.
KT Tape products are Hypoallergenic, Latex-Free, Natural Rubber-Free! This means that our products have been designed and developed to contain fewer potential substances that can trigger allergic reactions







ORIGINAL
PRO

item.content:encoded:
Price: $43.21 - $32.19
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:01 UTC – Details)


Capture the power of the sun with raw organic perfect food, packed with the power of nutrient-dense, raw, organically grown greens, sprouts and vegetable juices for the raw energy you need. Raw organic perfect food is the convenient, delicious way to get your Veggie Juice every day. No artificial flavors, sweeteners. By Garden of Life.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.66 x 3.66 x 6.62 inches; 8.5 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0658010114059
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 23, 2009
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Garden of Life
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B002HI1LSI
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Whole food supplement: Our whole food greens supplement provides naturally occurring antioxidants, enzymes, amino acids, essential fatty acids, and dozens other phytonutrients
Immune system support: This superfood supplement supports healthy digestion, detoxification, a healthy immune system, and already healthy blood sugar levels and metabolism
Digestive support: Our greens powder is bursting with live probiotics and enzymes for digestion support
Vegan greens: this superfood powder is vegan, certified organic, and dairy free, with no whole grass fillers and no preservatives

We want the best when it comes to our food. Why would we want anything different for our vitamins and supplements?

We are fanatical about food. We’re different that way. Whether we’re making a vitamin, or a probiotic, or a protein powder, we always start with real foods and these (foods) provide our formulas the power to be their best. We’re different that way, too. The synthetically created, chemical “breakthroughs” from huge commercial laboratories around the world are not for us.

As fanatical as we are over what goes into our products, we are even more obsessed about the things we keep out of them. We hate those synthetic chemicals that most companies use to make their products. This stuff makes machines work faster, and helps factories churn out super-sized containers at higher “efficiency.” We’re uncompromising about your health. Slow it down, make it by hand, grow it in rich soil with enough sun, air, water and time for it to be its best. Harvest it when ready. Treat it with care. Turn it into a power-packed nutritious food supplement. That’s what we are about.

The Science of Whole Food

Your body was created to eat, process, and derive its nutrition from food—real, healthy food. So, when we create our products, we start by looking at food. What is the “good stuff” in quality food that we are missing in our diets? Which of those foods have the greatest potential to impact—and empower—extraordinary health?

Clean is healthy

We start with what goes IN our products—true, whole food ingredients. But we don’t stop there. We also pay very close attention to what we keep OUT of them. And once again, we look at food—real nutrition food. When is the last time you picked up an apple, turned to read the ingredients, and saw a list of chemicals? If it’s not in your food, then we don’t want it in our supplements.

Traceability

Traceability is key to what makes Garden of Life’s products so special. Traceability starts with knowing where each and every ingredient in our products comes from and getting to know each and every source: where it’s grown; the farming practices; how they pay and treat the farm workers—everything. That’s why it’s so important to start with fruits and vegetables that are grown without these chemicals. We want to get the good stuff from foods that are grown without any of the bad stuff.

Read more

Read more

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:51 UTC – Details)


With more than 55 million units sold, Rummikub is one of the world’s best-selling and most-played games. It’s really no surprise that Rummikub is so popular – it has all the elements that make a great game: It’s easy to learn and fast moving, it’s different every time It’s played, it combines luck and strategy, and it changes quickly so every player has a chance to win until the very end. Players take turns placing numbered tiles in runs (consecutive numbers of the same color) and groups (three or more of the same number in different colors), Rummy style. It’s easy to learn, but packed with strategy – the “board” Changes all the time as players adjust the tiles on the table. The Joker tiles add to the fun and can be used as any color or number. Be the first player to play Every tile on your rack to win. Reinforces STEM skills like sequencing, pattern recognition and planning. Rummikub includes 106 high-quality plastic tiles, 4 plastic tile-holder racks, and complete instructions. For 2-4 players, ages 8 and up.
With more than 55 million units sold, Rummikub is one of the world’s best-selling and most-played games
Players take turns placing numbered tiles in runs or groups, Rummy style – the first player to use all of their tiles wins
Fast-paced, easy gameplay is ideal for people of different ages to play together
Reinforces STEM skills like sequencing, pattern recognition and planning
For 2-4 players, ages 8 and up

Rummikub Classic by Pressman, Ages 8 and Up, 2-4 Players

Fast-paced, easy to learn gameplay

It’s really no surprise that Rummikub is so popular – it has all the elements that make a great game: it’s easy to learn and fast moving, it’s different every time it’s played, it combines luck and strategy, and it changes quickly so every player has a chance to win until the very end.

Combine strategy and luck to clear your rack and win!

Players take turns placing numbered tiles in runs or groups, Rummy style. It’s easy to learn, but packed with strategy – the “board” changes all the time as players adjust the tiles on the table. The first player to use all of their tiles wins!

Perfect multigenerational game!

This fast-paced game is also perfect for playing with different ages of players, making it a great family game, and it helps teach younger players STEM skills like sequencing and pattern recognition.







Rummikub
Rummikub Premium Edition
Rummikub Six Player Edition
SEQUENCE
Tri-Ominos Deluxe
Description Rummikub is the popular family game of strategy and luck! Players try to be the first to play all of the tiles in their rack by placing them in runs and groups, rummy style. Reinforces STEM skills like sequencing and pattern recognition. It’s time to play like the pros! This set features the same components used in the official World Rummikub Championship. Players take turns placing numbered tiles in runs and groups, rummy style. Be the first to play every tile on your rack to win! Enjoy the classic game of Rummikub with even more players! Take turns placing numbered tiles in runs and groups, Rummy style. Be the first to play every tile on your rack to win! Includes more racks and numbers to accommodate the extra players. Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Block your opponents or remove their chips. The first player or team with the required number of SEQUENCES wins! The classic triangular domino game! In this easy to learn game, score points by matching numbers on the three-sided pieces. Increase your STEM skills as you combine strategy and a little luck for some fast-paced fun for the whole family!
Minimum Age 8+ 8+ 8+ 7+ 7+
Minimum Players 2 2 2 2 2
Maximum Players 4 4 6 12 4

From the brand

Games the Family Will Love

At Brybelly we love games, and we love to share games. Build better family game nights with beloved classics and fun new titles.

Shop Favorites & New Launches

How did we get our start?

In 2005 Brybelly was founded like all great companies: in a garage. What began as selling poker chips at flea markets has become a medium-sized Indiana business employing nearly 50 hoosiers.

What makes our products unique?

A Brybelly game tries to pack in extra value. If there’s a similar product, we want to include more stuff. If it’s a familiar game, we want to add fun extra rules for more replay value. If a deck of cards is all you need to play a game, we want to make that deck special.

Why do we love what we do?

Games are fun! And we think that fun can be contagious.

Old Favorites with Flair

Classic Games Given New Life

Games from Across the Globe

Looking for even more? We’ve probably got it! We’re always adding new and exciting games and experiences to our growing catalog.

Whether its board games, card games, dice games, even favorite casino games, gaming is our passion and we’re always looking to share with you our next big new thing. So keep your peepers peeled!

SHOOT THE POOP! Get wild with Shoot the Poop, a hilarious game for the whole family and makes perfect white elephant gifts for adults
NO PLUMBING REQUIRED: Includes a talking Tank the Toilet who’s flush with funny jokes, 12 plastic poop toys, and 2 launchers
POWER POOPER: This wild family game requires 2 AAA batteries to help Tank make crazy flushing sounds
THE FAMILY THAT POOPS TOGETHER: Enjoy some family toilet humor! Shoot the Poop is a great for 2 players kids games ages 4-8, 8-12+
HANDFUL OF POOP: Get launching with a fast-paced family dexterity game. Don’t get caught with your hands full of poo! Be the first to shoot your shot, and don’t forget to flush

Have a Poopy Day

Hi folks, meet Tank! He’s the talking toilet who loves to play. It’s up to you and one other player to get your fun flingers and form a doo-doo duo! Be the first player to launch all six of your poopy projectiles into Tank’s mouth. Powered by two AAA batteries, Tank will cheer you on as you take aim, ready, and fire away! This family dexterity game helps children develop fine motor skills, and it’s finished in a flash. Sink your last floater and win the game! Don’t forget to flush! When you pull Tank’s lever, he’ll always have something to say.

Read more

Why You’ll Love It

Shoot the Poop is a fast-playing game of reflex and humor. Play with 1 child or friend for some fun and a little bit of toilet humor. Age 5+, 2 players. Great for Christmas and White Elephant gifts and Birthday Presents from that crazy uncle.

Read more



Don’t Be a Donkey!
Cat-Tasrophe!
Irr-Elephant!
Honeycomb Hacov!
Looking for more family-friendly games from Brybelly? HEE-HAW! No pins, tails, or blindfolds required for this refreshing donkey game! Me-WOW! Save the kitty cat from the top of the tree in this classic and challenging kids dexterity game! More than an Earful! Place the platform, put the elephant in the right place, and try to keep it balanced! Sticky Situation! Use your paws to poke out pieces of honeycombs, snatching up delicious gobs of honey to munch for lunch!

If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Dog Diaper Bag, Anyone? As dog owners, we know what really makes life with dogs easier. We added the poop bag dispenser to the puppy travel bag so you never end up in a ‘stinky’ situation again! Our travel dog bag set is a great idea for dog mom, dog dad, and pet lover gifts!
Do You Want A Clean And Organized Car? Our removable divider and multiple pockets keep your and your dog’s essentials organized for your next beach, hiking, or overnight road trip! All your dog camping gear and travel supplies in one dog travel bag – always good to go. Our dog bags for traveling are airline-approved and feature a handy suitcase sleeve.
Good Dogs Deserve Great Gear! With premium padded straps for comfort and generous storage for dog travel accessories, you can carry the comforts of home on the go. Trust our commitment to quality with our portable dog food travel bags with high-quality zippers & water-resistant fabric. A sustainable substitute for plastic bags!
100% Lifetime Manufacturer Guarantee. At Rubyloo (Formerly Lucky Tail), it’s our mission to reinvent dog products to make your life better together. We’re a US-based company that provides innovation and quality you can trust. With our ‘Every Dog Should Have A Home’ initiative, your purchase will help a rescue find their forever home.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:10 UTC – Details)

Product Description

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Bag Dimensions
15″ x 13″ x 7″ 17″ x 11″ x 6″

Dog Diaper Bag, Anyone? As dog owners, we know what really makes life with dogs easier. We added the poop bag dispenser to the puppy travel bag so you never end up in a ‘stinky’ situation again! Our travel dog bag set is a great idea for dog mom, dog dad, and pet lover gifts!
Do You Want A Clean And Organized Car? Our removable divider and multiple pockets keep your and your dog’s essentials organized for your next beach, hiking, or overnight road trip! All your dog camping gear and travel supplies in one dog travel bag – always good to go. Our dog bags for traveling are airline-approved and feature a handy suitcase sleeve.
Good Dogs Deserve Great Gear! With premium padded straps for comfort and generous storage for dog travel accessories, you can carry the comforts of home on the go. Trust our commitment to quality with our portable dog food travel bags with high-quality zippers & water-resistant fabric. A sustainable substitute for plastic bags!
100% Lifetime Manufacturer Guarantee. At Rubyloo (Formerly Lucky Tail), it’s our mission to reinvent dog products to make your life better together. We’re a US-based company that provides innovation and quality you can trust. With our ‘Every Dog Should Have A Home’ initiative, your purchase will help a rescue find their forever home.

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner. Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 playing chips: 35 red, 50 blue and 50 green, and Complete Instructions For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up.
Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board – when you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE
Each player or team tries to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES before their opponents
Easy enough for children, challenging for adults!
Exciting gameplay develops STEM skills like strategy
Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips (50 Green, 50 Blue, 35 Red), and Complete Instructions
For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up

SEQUENCE Contents:

Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips, Complete Instructions

SEQUENCE by Goliath

Ages 7 and up, 2-12 players

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner.

  • This exciting game of strategy is fun for the whole family
  • Great for individual or team play
  • Easy enough for kids and challenging enough for adults

Read more

Playing with SEQUENCE

Develops STEM skills like strategy

Players select a card of their choice from their hand and place it face up on a discard pile. Then they place a chip on the corresponding space on the board. Each card is pictured twice on the game board, so choose your space wisely!

Jacks add excitement to gameplay!

Jacks with two eyes are wild and can be used to place a chip on any space on the board. A one-eyed Jack can be played to remove an opponent’s chip from the board. Keep in mind, you cannot remove a chip from a completed SEQUENCE.

Winning the game

The first player or team to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES wins the game. It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting – it’s SEQUENCE!

Read more




SEQUENCE
Jumbo SEQUENCE Tube Game
SEQUENCE for Kids
SEQUENCE Letters
SEQUENCE Dice Game
Description Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Block your opponents or remove their chips. The first player or team with the required number of SEQUENCES wins! It’s the classic game of SEQUENCE jumbo-sized! The game includes a 32″ x 27″ durable cushioned playing mat which provides easy viewing that’s perfect for large groups and parties! The tube offers convenient storage for future gameplay. It’s the exciting game of SEQUENCE just for kids! Play an animal card from your hand, and place your chip on the corresponding animal on the board. The first player with four chips in a row wins! Reading is not required to play. Players sound out the letter on their cards, match it to the beginning sound of a picture on the game board, then place a chip there. Colored squares on the cards and game board help with faster letter recognition. Get 4 in a row for a SEQUENCE to win! It’s the strategic game of SEQUENCE as an easy to play dice game! Roll the dice and place a chip on a corresponding number on the game board. Get 5 chips in a row and you win! The dice add a fun twist to the game that your whole family will enjoy!
Minimum Age 7+ 7+ 3+ 4+ 7+
Minimum Players 2 2 2 2 2
Maximum Players 12 12 4 4 4

Exploding kittens is a card game for people who are into kittens and explosions and laser beams and sometimes goats. In this highly-strategic, kitty-powered version of Russian roulette, players draw cards until someone draws an exploding kitten, at which point They explode, they are Dead, and they are out of the game – unless that player has a defuse card, which can defuse the kitten using things like laser pointers, belly rubs, and catnip sandwiches. All of the other cards in the deck are used to move, mitigate, or avoid the exploding kittens. Exploding kittens is the most-funded game in the history of Kickstarter, and has paved the way for peace and tranquility in the modern world.
A Kitty-Powered Russian Roulette Card Game – The hit party game for family and friends who are into kittens and explosions and laser beams and sometimes goats.
A Simple Card Game for Kids and Adults – Perfect for all occasions, including a family game night, beach trip, road trip or drinking with friends!
Game Of The Year Award Winner – More than 10 million copies sold, breaking records in kids games, adult games and everything in between.
Beginner-Friendly, Just 2 Minutes to Learn – If you draw an Exploding Kitten, you lose and you are full of loser sad-sauce. All the other cards in the deck help you avoid or mitigate your risk of drawing an Exploding Kitten. If you don’t explode, YOU WIN!
56 Cards, with Box and Instructions – A simple card game for kids, drinking, kittens, and adults, not in that order.

Read more
